item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (157 points | 63 comments)
2. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (82 points | 30 comments)
3. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (129 points | 30 comments)
4. New images of Jupiter (312 points | 53 comments)

6. Model Predictive Control in the Browser with WebAssembly (51 points | 7 comments)
7. Learning Not to Trust the All-In Podcast in Ten Minutes (39 points | 5 comments)
8. Title drops in movies (394 points | 130 comments)
9. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch, Nintendo confirms (140 points | 91 comments)
10. Monorepo – Our Experience (38 points | 49 comments)
11. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (90 points | 7 comments)
12. Trump wins presidency for second time (1229 points | 5304 comments)
13. 98.css – A design system for building faithful recreations of old UIs (272 points | 68 comments)
14. Powering the Mars Base (74 points | 54 comments)
15. Show HN: Term-Lisp – A Lisp, based on pattern matching and term rewriting (13 points | 3 comments)

18. Show HN: Aide, an open-source AI native IDE (78 points | 68 comments)
19. Only 5.3% of US welders are women. After years as a professor, I became one (182 points | 245 comments)
20. Upcoming changes to the DNSSEC root trust anchor (75 points | 21 comments)
21. What has case distinction but is neither uppercase nor lowercase? (122 points | 48 comments)
22. Hacking cars in JavaScript (Replay attacks in the browser with the HackRF) (9 points | 1 comment)
23. 3D Rotation Design (51 points | 11 comments)
24. Defibrillation devices save lives using 1k times less electricity (92 points | 52 comments)
25. EU opens antitrust investigation into anticompetitive practices by Corning (74 points | 14 comments)
26. Why the deep learning boom caught almost everyone by surprise (180 points | 117 comments)
27. It's raining PFAS in South Florida – study (54 points | 19 comments)
28. Superstreamer – OSS streaming toolkit from video source to player (134 points | 7 comments)
29. Now lie in it: an uxntal retrospective (44 points | 9 comments)
